casebody.data:
PETE VICARI GENERAL CONTRACTOR, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Cross Appellant. Nos. 02-5135, 02-5136. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: June 3, 2003.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, PLAGER, Senior Circuit Judge, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judge.

Prior report: 51 Fed.Cl. 161

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
